channel.title: Thomas Mangin on Pi Society
channel.description: Recent content in Thomas Mangin on Pi Society

item.title: External Speaker: Thomas Mangin
item.description: Ever wondered how the internet works? What sort of technology goes into connecting the world? Where did it all come from, and who invented it? And just how exactly do all of those cat pictures end up online? PiSoc is very proud to introduce our first external speaker of the year - Thomas Mangin. Thomas is the Operational and Technical Director at Exa Networks, and has been since he co-founded the company in 2003.
